content.en: Drug discovery algorithms: Scientists have been using algorithms to investigate various aspects of drug development and metabolism. These algorithms, such as partial least squares regression and support vector machines, are being used to answer questions like how binding free energies relate to biological activities of drug candidates, recent achievements in machine learning applications to cytochrome P450 datasets, and the development of computational models to predict the inhibitive effect of compounds against specific CYP isoforms. By harnessing the power of machine learning, researchers hope to improve the prediction of drug interactions and identify potential inhibitors of cytochrome P450 enzymes.
content.da: Algoritmer til lægemiddelopdagelse: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at undersøge forskellige aspekter af lægemiddeludvikling og metabolisme. Disse algoritmer, såsom partial least squares regression og support vector machines, bliver brugt til at besvare spørgsmål som hvordan binding frie energier relaterer til biologiske aktiviteter af lægemiddelkandidater, nylige resultater i maskinlæringsapplikationer til cytochrome P450 datasæt, og udviklingen af computermodeller til at forudsige den hæmmende effekt af forbindelser mod specifikke CYP isoformer. Ved at udnytte kraften i maskinlæring håber forskere at forbedre forudsigelsen af lægemiddelinteraktioner og identificere potentielle hæmmere af cytochrome P450 enzymer.
